attributes.action: create a cohererent waste and packaging policy without taxing us more
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before introducing yet more ways to take our money, the government should look at waste as a whole. Firstly, a minimum packaging law should be introduced to reduce the amout of waste at source. Require all packaging materials be recyclable within 24 months. Tax breaks for companies to set up recycling plants for all types of waste

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
